title: Can someone get banned for account sharing?
body:
I was playing a game (normals), and the Yasuo was clearly better than everyone there. So he starts bragging about how this isn't his account, that it is his cousins account and he is Gold 5 ranked and his cousin is only Bronze 5, and that everyone in this low MMR are so easy to kill.

Is this a bannable offense? 
I have video footage of the game and of him admitting he is playing someone elses account, if I was to take this any further.
I just don't think that this is fair, and I want something done about it.

replies.body:
This is against our terms of service and we will take action if this is valid. 

Can you please submit this to our Player Support team? Here is the link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us (Just click Submit a Report at the top right of the page)
